title: (x) Osama movie poster - Trajan {Adriano E}
content:
i'm trying to find the type face of the title movie OSAMA ![type](http://web.archive.org/web/20080103050807im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28084.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Charmed series logo - custom design by Margo Chase {Ole S](http://web.archive.org/web/20080103050807/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3485 "Go to previous forum topic") [Fillings - not dental ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080103050807/http:/www.typophile.com/node/26938 "Go to next forum topic")
author: shimasu

comments.content: Seems like [LINOTYPE TRAJAN BOLD](http://web.archive.org/web/20080103050807/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trajan/bold/testdrive.html?s=OSAMA&p=48) with a modified S.
